methods.get:
Get the current Clock.

:return: (io.deephaven.base.clock.Clock) the current Clock
methods.getDefault:
Get the default (System) Clock.

:return: (io.deephaven.base.clock.Clock) the default Clock
methods.reset: Reset the Clock that will be returned by get() to the default value.
methods.set:
Set the Clock that will be returned by get().

:param newTimesource: io.deephaven.base.clock.Clock

text:
This is a hook to enable testing and simulation.
 Users of Clock should use this factory to get an instance. When they do,
 it is possible to change the class behavior from a test harness.

 Note: This would be better housed as a member of Clock.
